I am relaxing after a crazy week of #Inauguration coverage. Yay for coffee and catching up on @philandalex videos!
It does not feel like only my second week back at CBN News! Talk about hitting the ground… https://t.co/Vw4wCPUiUu
Inaugural Ball fun with the @cbnnews team. https://t.co/dWSUpSNonL
Trump ends his speech with #MAGA
References to winning: 2. References to God: 4. If you're counting. #CBNInauguration
Rep. Louie Gohmert waving to someone, he's seated right behind Trump.
"We must think big and dream even bigger," Trump says. #CBNinauguration
"When America is united, America is totally unstoppable." Trump says.
Trump says "We will unite civilized world against Radical Islamic Terrorism, which we will eradicate completely from the face of the Earth."
"We will shine for everyone to follow," Trump says US will reinforce old alliances, build new ones.
Trump says "we will follow two rules: buy American, hire American."
"I will fight for you with every breath in my body and I will never, ever let you down." @realDonaldTrump promises #CBNInauguration
"From this day forward it's going to be only America first, America first," Trump says re: trade/taxes/immigration/foreign affairs decisions
.@realDonaldTrump : "The oath I take today is an oath of allegiance to all Americans."
Trump's speech theme is power to the people, hitting the theme of "forgotten no longer" hard.
Trump says the forgotten are "forgotten no longer." #CBNinauguration
Trump says 1/20/17 is the day the people became the rulers of this nation again. #CBNinauguration
"What truly matters is not which party controls our gov't, but whether our gov't is controlled by the people." - @realDonaldTrump
"This moment is your moment, it belongs to you." - @realDonaldTrump "It belongs to everyone gathered here today and everyone watching."
"We are transferring power from Washington DC and giving it back to you, the people." - @realDonaldTrump #CBNinauguration
A perk of being President: You don't have to hold your own umbrella.
Trump: We will rebuild our country, restore promise for all of our people. #CBNInauguration
Trump's first comments as President: "Thank you."
#BREAKINGNEWS @realDonaldTrump is now officially the President of the United States. #Inauguration @CBNinauguration
.@mike_pence sworn in as Vice President of the United States. #CBNinauguration
The welcome concert ended with a fireworks show. @realDonaldTrump made brief remarks, said he would unify the count… https://t.co/cVnJzjm8KB
This is the line to get screened for the #Inauguration Welcome Concert. #CBNinauguration https://t.co/Kw0Um4SmPb
Waiting for @realDonaldTrump to arrive at the #inauguration Welcome Concert. #CBNInauguration https://t.co/renH4Azfja
Welcome concert tonight at the Lincoln Memorial. https://t.co/jadyXWMXsh
@JoneeLewisTV @ErinMoranWX @enews I am not either! Also, I am a week behind!
POTUS: You don't want an America where a small sliver of people are doing really well and others are fighting for scraps.
Obama says there are a lot of people who voted for @realDonaldTrump because they feel forgotten.
President Obama says he worries about inequality.
POTUS on LGBT rights: Says he couldn't be prouder of the progress made over the last 10 years.
Obama: President-Elect will have his own policy. Ambassadorship has different views than I do.We'll see how their approach plays itself out.
Obama re:Mideast: "I don't see how this issue gets resolved in a way that maintains Israel as both Jewish and a democracy."
Obama said "I think the status quo is unsustainable," re: Israel and Palestine.
Obama says he came into office wanting to encourage "serious peace talks." Invested time/energy/effort. Ultimately, we cannot force peace.
Obama Re: Israeli UN resolution: "I continue to be significantly worried about the Israeli/Palestinian issue."
@itsashleyhall We appreciate it!
Obama says his priorities are marriage (will celebrate 25th anniversary this year) and spending time with his girls.
On what's next: Obama says he will take time to process, he will write, he will "be quiet a little bit, not hear myself talk so darn much."
Obama said he won't comment on Inauguration. Just that he will be there. @MichelleObama will be there.
"Reality has a way of biting back if you aren't paying attention to it," -@POTUS
.@POTUS: @realDonaldTrump's views will be shaped by his advisers. "This is a job of such magnitude that you can't do it by yourself."
Obama says his conversations with @realDonaldTrump have been cordial, fairly lengthy at times.
.@POTUS : It is important for US to stand up for principle that big countries don't go around and bully smaller countries.
Obama says as soon as Russia stops encroaching upon independence, sanctions will be removed.
Obama: reason for sanctions in Russia not b/c of nuclear weapons, but sovereignty of Ukraine had been approached upon by Russia.
Obama says he looked at particulars of Manning case & felt like commuting her sentence was appropriate.
Obama says broadly, in cyber age, we will have to find balance of transparency/recognition of risk.
Re: Wikileaks, Obama says he doesn't see a contradiction.
POTUS: Manning took responsibility for her crime, the sentence she received was disproportionate relative to what other leakers received.
Obama: "Chelsea Manning has served a tough prison sentence."
Obama: "I'm looking forward to being an active consumer of your work rather than the subject of it." (referring to the WH press corps)
Obama says a free press is central to democracy. "It doesn't work if we don't have a well-informed citizenry."
Obama: "Having you in this building has made us work better. It keeps us honest."
Obama to press: I have enjoyed working with you. You're supposed to ask me tough questions.
Obama says he has been in touch with the Bush family. "They are as fine a couple as we know." Says sending prayers and love.
Waiting for @POTUS's last press conference before leaving office to begin.
